title: Words on graphs
text: InputThe input is a directed (multi)graph.The first line gives the number of edges M and the number of nodes N (â‰¥ 2). Then each edge is described by a line of the form "FROM TO LABEL". Nodes (FROM, TO) are numbers in the range 0 .. N-1 and labels are also numbers.All numbers in the input are non-negative integers less then 2000.OutputPrint "YES" if there are two distinct walks with the same labelling from node 0 to node 1, otherwise print "NO".Example 1Input:4 40 2 00 3 02 1 13 1 2Output:NOExample 2Input:10 90 2 02 1 02 3 03 4 04 2 02 5 05 6 06 7 07 8 08 2 0Output:YESIn this case the shortest labelling that appears on two walks is 0 repeated 10 times.
